alert.note: Alert for Adams (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 8:46AM PDT until August 12 at 9:30AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Adams County in eastern Washington... * Until 930 AM PDT. * At 846 AM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Kahlotus, or 12 miles northeast of Connell, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Lind, Ralston, Pizzro and Paha. This includes Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 208 and 218. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
